guide.title: Gentoo Configuration Tools
guide.abstract: This document specifies the Gentoo Configuration Tools project.

body.p: This project is an attempt to design tools that will make Gentoo configuration more user friendly, although these tools don't necceserily have GUI frontends.

There are several requirements that are valid for all tools:
Plugable frontends: all tools are required to have a GUI as well as a console (ncurses) interface.
A tool to select the services that should start/stop at specified runlevels. This tool is also able to start, stop and restart individual services.
